entry.question: What happens if my opponent is supposed to flip more than 4 cards during the battle?
entry.answer: The extra cards are simply not flipped. It doesnâ€™t matter whether those extra flips were because of abilities like bold, a white battle icon, or any other ability.

entry.question: If I Bolster into a Multi Mission Gear, can I play Dampening Field and it activates?
entry.answer: You can play Dampening Field, but it would be past the point where it would trigger.
